name: Revenge of the Baskerville Bloodhound
author: Updating
content: Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his fatherâ€™s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.This time, he&#039s ready to bite the hand that feeds.
